children.name: account
children.sourceText: Behold, is there not an account concerning them of old, that they by their secret plans did obtain kingdoms and great glory?

children.name: Akish
children.sourceText: And now, therefore, let my father send for Akish, the son of Kimnor; and behold, I am fair, and I will dance before him, and I will please him, that he will desire me to wife; wherefore if he shall desire of thee that ye shall give unto him me to wife, then shall ye say:

children.name: am
children.sourceText: And now, therefore, let my father send for Akish, the son of Kimnor; and behold, I am fair, and I will dance before him, and I will please him, that he will desire me to wife; wherefore if he shall desire of thee that ye shall give unto him me to wife, then shall ye say:

children.name: bring
children.sourceText: I will give her if ye will bring unto me the head of my father, the king.

children.name: brought
children.sourceText: Hath he not read the record which our fathers brought across the great deep?
